The council looked in shock as the screen shut down. "Do you suspect 
the Stunticons
are involved in foul play. I recognized two robots we didnt send, and 
Motormaster
seemed at a lose of words." 

"Perhaps." Another added. "But we must deal with that later." He 
turned his
chair, and faced Havotron. "You will leave soon, and with you, will 
go a legend."
He motioned to Reflector, who unveiled the sheet covering the geurny. 
On it
was a small portable primitived device. "The humans called it a 
portable, walk
man." One of the council Members said. Reflector proceeded to hook up 
a small
box, to some wires, to the "walk-man", and then started it up. 
Through a large
hum of energy, then transfer began, and the Tripredicus council had 
power in
their eyes. "Yes, awaken unit 37, Decepticon comunicator." One said, 
excitement
in his voice.
